data.text: Protests at the US-Canada border are threatening supply chains and creating major disruptions. Access to three border crossings in Michigan, North Dakota and Montana have been cut off by truckers protesting Covid-19 vaccine mandates and other rules,

1/3 Vaccine research at the University of Montana is growing as the program is expecting to start clinical trials for an opioid vaccine in 2023, while continuing research for the prevention of other diseases.

They lied that this was a Republican and Democrat Vaccine thing. 

It wasnâ€™t. Montana is heavily vaxxed. 

Now they have to eat crow because they realize their voters are sick of it.

I pledged to the people of Montana that I would not vote to fund a government that is forcing millions of Americans to receive a COVID-19 vaccine. Today, I voted against another continuing resolution (CR) to fund the government through March 11th.
